history.subject: 关于 e820map 结构信息的疑问
history.content:
e820map:
memory: 0009fc00, [00000000, 0009fbff], type = 1.

memory: 00000400, [0009fc00, 0009ffff], type = 2.
memory: 00010000, [000f0000, 000fffff], type = 2.
memory: 07ee0000, [00100000, 07fdffff], type = 1.
memory: 00020000, [07fe0000, 07ffffff], type = 2.
memory: 00040000, [fffc0000, ffffffff], type = 2.

为什么 e820 map  没有 0x08000000 -0xefffffff  的内存地址信息？ 为什么e820的值nr_map =6 而用dmesg | grep e820 命令会显示 所有的地址？ 以下是显示结果

[    0.000000] e820: BIOS-provided physical RAM map:
[    0.000000] BIOS-e820: [mem 0x0000000000000000-0x000000000009fbff] usable
[    0.000000] BIOS-e820: [mem 0x000000000009fc00-0x000000000009ffff] reserved
[    0.000000] BIOS-e820: [mem 0x00000000000f0000-0x00000000000fffff] reserved
[    0.000000] BIOS-e820: [mem 0x0000000000100000-0x00000000dffeffff] usable
[    0.000000] BIOS-e820: [mem 0x00000000dfff0000-0x00000000dfffffff] ACPI data
[    0.000000] BIOS-e820: [mem 0x00000000fec00000-0x00000000fec00fff] reserved
[    0.000000] BIOS-e820: [mem 0x00000000fee00000-0x00000000fee00fff] reserved
[    0.000000] BIOS-e820: [mem 0x00000000fffc0000-0x00000000ffffffff] reserved
[    0.000000] BIOS-e820: [mem 0x0000000100000000-0x000000041fffffff] usable
[    0.000000] e820: update [mem 0x00000000-0x00000fff] usable ==> reserved
[    0.000000] e820: remove [mem 0x000a0000-0x000fffff] usable
[    0.000000] e820: last_pfn = 0x420000 max_arch_pfn = 0x400000000
[    0.000000] e820: last_pfn = 0xdfff0 max_arch_pfn = 0x400000000
[    3.566737] e820: [mem 0xe0000000-0xfebfffff] available for PCI devices
[    4.107508] e820: reserve RAM buffer [mem 0x0009fc00-0x0009ffff]
[    4.107509] e820: reserve RAM buffer [mem 0xdfff0000-0xdfffffff]

dmesg | grep e820 显示的是宿主系统的信息，ucore是跑在qemu构造的虚拟机上，板子是qemu-system-i386。
dmesg | grep e820 显示的是宿主系统的信息，ucore是跑在qemu构造的虚拟机上，板子是qemu-system-i386。

children.subject:
vanj wrote:

dmesg | grep e820 显示的是宿主系统的信息，ucore是跑在qemu构造的虚拟机上，板子是qemu-system-i386。

那请问 0x08000000 -0xefffffff  的内存地址信息 为什么没有在e820map 这里存储呢？还说另有相关内容的存储结构？

猜测是映射给了IO地址或者被保留了。

但是我有个疑惑的地方是：在Makefile文件中启动qemu，即没有指定-machine参数，也没指定-cpu。

用$(info,变量名) 调试 就会看到 qemu 的参数了 不知道你用的哪个makefile文件

ifndef QEMU
QEMU := $(shell if which qemu-system-i386 > /dev/null; \
 then echo 'qemu-system-i386'; exit; \
 elif which i386-elf-qemu > /dev/null; \
 then echo 'i386-elf-qemu'; exit; \
 elif which qemu > /dev/null; \
 then echo 'qemu'; exit; \
 else \
 echo "***" 1>&2; \
 echo "*** Error: Couldn't find a working QEMU executable." 1>&2; \
 echo "*** Is the directory containing the qemu binary in your PATH" 1>&2; \
 echo "***" 1>&2; exit 1; fi)
endif

这个指定了 cpu的版本了

[~/moocos/ucore_lab/labcodes/lab5]
moocos-> make qemu V=
qemu-system-i386 -parallel stdio -hda bin/ucore.img -drive file=bin/swap.img,media=disk,cache=writeback -serial null
(THU.CST) os is loading ...

我在做lab5，加 V= 参数，可以看出确实没指定。

qemu-system-i386 --help 中也没说 -machine -cpu 有默认值。

-machine [type=]name[,prop[=value][,...]]
                selects emulated machine ('-machine help' for list)
                property accel=accel1[:accel2[:...]] selects accelerator
                supported accelerators are kvm, xen, tcg (default: tcg)

qemu-system-i386   兼容i386 的都可以
